about_the_game:
Dark Desire Mute 4


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

"“Holy ... love, you did all this for me?” Michelle asks. " - episode 1

"Addison takes Cindy’s hand and leads her into the apartment when there are two yoga mats laid out, some incense burning sweetly, and only the light from the open window drifting in." - episode 2

"“I need someone loyal, someone willing to do anything for me, no questions asked. That’s how it works in this business,” Stephanie sighs. " - episode 3

The visual novel has 4 episodes with 2 paths per episode and sometimes different outfits:
Episode 01 --- Michelle Comes Home
Episode 01x1 --- Ashley and Arisa

Episode 02 --- Addison's Passion
Episode 02x1 --- Cindy and Michelle - Sweet and Cute 1

Episode 03 --- Stephanie’s Second in Command
Episode 03x1 --- Cindy and Michelle - Sweet and Cute 2

Episode 04 --- Jeff's House (with Cindy)
- contains 3 view options with different outfits, poses and locations

Episode 05 --- SOFI: Beth and Katie
- new! 24-APR-2023

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Dark Desire Mute 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
